thag13.1:1.2: paddhagū → paddhagu (bj, pts1ed, pts2ed); patthagū (sya1ed, sya2ed); paṭṭhagū (mr)
thag13.1:4.1: apaviddhaṁ → tadapaviddhaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
thag13.1:9.3: Abyāpajjādhimuttassa → abyāpajjhādhimuttassa (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
thag13.1:12.1: ekagghano → ekaghano (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
